definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: Draw a Cone. Pass this into handle functions.
sentences.chinese: 繪製一個圓錐體，傳遞到控制柄函數。

sentences.english: The cone shape of the spindle-knots also drives droplets towards their centre.
sentences.chinese: 紡錘節的圓錐體形狀也促使水滴在它們周圍彙集。

sentences.english: The paper designed a fiber placement machine for coniform shaped objects.
sentences.chinese: 本文設計了一臺用於鋪放圓錐體的纖維鋪放機。

sentences.english: How many tapers can you see here?
sentences.chinese: 看這副圖片，有幾個圓錐體？

sentences.english: The Reynolds number based on the cone base diameter is 50, 000.
sentences.chinese: 基於圓錐體底部直徑的雷諾數爲50，000。

sentences.english: The convex plate consists of a cylinder and a cone.
sentences.chinese: 所述的凸臺由圓柱體和圓錐體兩部分組成。

sentences.english: These droplets trickle down the inner wall into a circular trough at the inner base of the cone.
sentences.chinese: 這些液滴在內璧滴下進入圓錐體底部的圓形槽內。
